Technique: PRESSED IN A FORM/MODEL; PAINTED; FAYENCE
Name: Clasp of a necklace
Description: The object, which represents a lotus flower with petals of blue and yellow, formed the clasp of a necklace (see p. ex. Brussels E.7534). On the undecorated side of the object many small holes have been pierced in order to attach strings to the necklace.
